name: SuperBunnyBall
description:
Hi,

In this game, Help the Bunny to escape from the Hand of the extraterrestrials. This game is made whith Unity, is a 2D platformers. The mechanic recreated, in 2D, came from the game Super Monkey Ball by Sega.

All graphics assets as created by me. 

The differents musics are free of rights :

Powerup! By Jeremy Blake

Chopsticks By Text Me Records / Jorge Hernandez

Thank you for Playing !
